title: Working With Geospatial EmbeddingsWwith PostGIS And PGVector
description: In this talk, we share how we built geospatial embeddings directly into Geobase.app, our geospatial backend. By extending PostGIS with PGVector, we enabled semantic search and similarity queries over maps, rasters, and vector data sets. Weâ€™ll walk through the technical design choices, from embedding generation to storage and retrieval, and show how these capabilities power real-world use cases, such as neighborhood similarity, environmental monitoring, and AI-driven geospatial assistants. The session will highlight lessons learned in integrating modern AI/ML methods with a Postgres-native stack, making advanced retrieval workflows accessible to developers and analysts.
author: Decision Labs

title: PostGIS Day 2025 Talk Now Live - Working with Geospatial Embeddings
description: Watch our talk from PostGIS Day 2025 on working with geospatial embeddings and how they're transforming spatial data analysis.
